message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $950,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value this product brings is substantial.  I could be willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Would $900,000 be agreeable?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $875,000 for the product. This is the highest amount I can afford without compromising other financial obligations.
